attributes.action: Suspend wages to all MP’s if we do not leave the EU on 29th March.
attributes.background: Due to the ineptitude of this Parliament to create a deal with the EU and lengthen the uncertainty to our economy with an extension to Article 50. All Members of Parliament should not take a wage until they have sorted Brexit out. Maybe having no income might concentrate their minds.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
